title: Applying to Medical School with AMCAS®
description: The American Medical College Application Service® (AMCAS®) is the AAMC's centralized medical school application processing service.
cleaned_text: New section The American Medical College Application Service® (AMCAS®) is the AAMC's centralized medical school application processing service. Most U.S. medical schools use AMCAS as the primary application method for their first-year entering classes. New section New section New section
